ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && $Profile.Name <> 'Master Data Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'Developer Administrator (Non US)' && $Profile.Name <> 'eBiz Master Data Admin (Non US)' && $Profile.Name <> 'CSR Contract Admin' && $Profile.Name <> 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser' && $Profile.Name <> 'accountwebform profile' && $Profile.Name <> 'Honeywell System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)' && $Profile.Name <> 'Services Interfaces API Profile'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To create a new account please contact the Aero Data Master Team
